Content.Text:
<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...so you raised this flower yourself?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>You've done a wonderful job, <MYNAME>!
Simply a gorgeous blossom!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>Of all the <ITEMNAME0>s I've seen,
this is one of the very finest! Excellent work,
truly worthy of accolades.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You must have put so much effort into raising
this flower, but with results this impressive,
viewing it is more than enough reward.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>Here, take it and place it in a prominent place in
your house. It's not every day that I am so
moved by the quality of a flower!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>But you mustn't rest on your laurels. Keep up
the good work and continue to raise gorgeous
flowers.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_L><MYNAME>, what is this?! I can hardly bear to
look at the poor thing!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>This is one of the sorriest
<ITEMNAME0>s I've ever laid eyes on!
How can one raise something so sickly?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, so you just threw some seeds in the ground,
watered them once in a while, and brought me
one of the few that actually bloomed.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
<WINDOW_FLAME_L>I can scarcely find the words to convey my
disappointment! Keep it, if only as a reminder of
what flowers should never look like!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>Listen carefully now, <MYNAME>. What flowers
need most...is love! I know you're capable of
raising them with so much more care than this.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You might have toiled to raise the poor thing...

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
But I know this <ITEMNAME0> could
have been so much more. You have it in you to
raise flowers to their true potential!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It seems you've put in no small amount of
effort...
<PAGE>
but it's still much too soon to start comparing
your flowers to mine.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This one has its own stark kind of charm,
though. Display it in your home with pride.
<PAGE>
Before long, I think you'll realize how you can
grow even better flowers.
